attributes.additional_details: Gcse exams not taking place in 2021 may lead to teacher assessment fiasco. With teacher assessed grades many grades may be downgraded not allowing children to encounter their full potential which will affect their future.
attributes.background: i believe gcse exams in 2021 should take place. i would like the government to not withdraw gcse exams in 2021

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition:

Don’t cancel GCSES and A-Levels in 2021
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554219
